desc: Dream Weavers Farm is a small family owned farm located in Windsor, Va. We grow and harvest lavender to produce an assortment of lavender products. Our goal is not only provide quality lavender products but educate our customers on the benefits of the herb as well as how to use it.

layout.text: Ours is an incredible one about family, friends, adventure and dreams. As we begin the next chapter we invite you to join us on the journey.
